languages.text: {n}Однако еретики не сдались без боя. Вскоре яростный пси-гомон выводка пронесся над ульями, ввергая отважных воинов в ужас или кровавое бешенство. Хор астропатов заглушил его грозными песнопениями, но схватка эта была испытанием воли, и лишь самые дисциплинированные и стойкие псайкеры могли выжить в ней.{/n}

{n}But the heretics did not go down without a fight. Soon, an enraged outcry of psy energy from the brood swept through and above the hives, plunging the brave warriors into horror or bloody insanity. The Astropathic Choir had managed to drown it out with their menacing chants, but this was a test of wills, and only the most disciplined and steadfast psykers withstood its sheer force.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Однако еретики не сдались без боя. Вскоре яростный пси-гомон выводка пронесся над ульями, ввергая отважных воинов в ужас или кровавое бешенство. Хор астропатов заглушил его грозными песнопениями, но схватка эта была испытанием воли, и лишь самые дисциплинированные и стойкие псайкеры могли выжить в ней.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}But the heretics did not go down without a fight. Soon, an enraged psy-roar of the brood had swept above the hives, plunging the brave warriors into horror or bloody insanity. The choir of Astropaths had managed to drown it out with their menacing chants, but this battle was a test of wills, and only the most disciplined and steadfast psykers could survive in it.{/n}

{n}But the heretics did not go down without a fight. Soon, an enraged psy-roar of the brood had swept above the hives, plunging the brave warriors into horror or bloody insanity. The choir of Astropaths had managed to drown it out with their menacing chants, but this battle was a test of wills, and only the most disciplined and steadfast psykers could survive in it.{/n}

{n}But the heretics did not go down without a fight. Soon, an enraged outcry of psy energy from the brood swept through and above the hives, plunging the brave warriors into horror or bloody insanity. The Astropathic Choir had managed to drown it out with their menacing chants, but this was a test of wills, and only the most disciplined and steadfast psykers withstood its sheer force.{/n}

{n}But the heretics did not go down without a fight. Soon, an enraged outcry of psy energy from the brood swept through and above the hives, plunging the brave warriors into horror or bloody insanity. The Astropathic Choir had managed to drown it out with their menacing chants, but this was a test of wills, and only the most disciplined and steadfast psykers withstood its sheer force.{/n}

{n}But the heretics did not go down without a fight. Soon, an enraged outcry of psy energy from the brood swept through and above the hives, plunging the brave warriors into horror or bloody insanity. The Astropathic Choir had managed to drown it out with their menacing chants, but this was a test of wills, and only the most disciplined and steadfast psykers withstood its sheer force.{/n}

languages.text: {n}但是，异端们并没有不战而降。很快，虫群发出了愤怒的灵能尖啸，席卷了整个巢都，让那些勇敢的战士们陷入了恐惧与血腥的疯狂之中。然而，星语唱诗班却用充满力量的颂歌淹没了灵能尖啸。这是对意志的考验，只有最自律、最坚定的灵能者才能禁受住它纯粹的力量。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But the heretics did not go down without a fight. Soon, an enraged outcry of psy energy from the brood swept through and above the hives, plunging the brave warriors into horror or bloody insanity. The Astropathic Choir had managed to drown it out with their menacing chants, but this was a test of wills, and only the most disciplined and steadfast psykers withstood its sheer force.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}但是，异端们并没有不战而降。很快，虫群发出了愤怒的灵能尖啸，席卷了整个巢都，让那些勇敢的战士们陷入了恐惧与血腥的疯狂之中。然而，星语唱诗班却用充满力量的颂歌淹没了灵能尖啸。这是对意志的考验，只有最自律、最坚定的灵能者才能禁受住它纯粹的力量。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pero los herejes no cayeron sin luchar. Enseguida, un grito enfurecido de energía psi procedente de la prole recorrió y sobrevoló las colmenas, sumiendo a los valientes guerreros en el horror o en una sangrienta locura. El Coro de Astrópatas había conseguido ahogarlo con sus amenazadores cánticos, pero se trataba de una prueba de voluntad, y solo los psíquicos más disciplinados y firmes resistieron su fuerza.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But the heretics did not go down without a fight. Soon, an enraged outcry of psy energy from the brood swept through and above the hives, plunging the brave warriors into horror or bloody insanity. The Astropathic Choir had managed to drown it out with their menacing chants, but this was a test of wills, and only the most disciplined and steadfast psykers withstood its sheer force.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pero los herejes no cayeron sin luchar. Enseguida, un grito enfurecido de energía psi procedente de la prole recorrió y sobrevoló las colmenas, sumiendo a los valientes guerreros en el horror o en una sangrienta locura. El Coro de Astrópatas había conseguido ahogarlo con sus amenazadores cánticos, pero se trataba de una prueba de voluntad, y solo los psíquicos más disciplinados y firmes resistieron su fuerza.{/n}

languages.text: {n}しかし異端者たちは戦わずに倒れることはなかった。間もなく、個体群からの怒りに満ちた超能力のエネルギーの怒号がハイヴ上空を駆け巡り、勇敢な戦士たちを恐怖や流血の狂気に陥れた。感応通信聖歌隊は、危険な詠唱でその怒号を掻き消そうとしていたが、これは意志の力試しであり、その強大な力に耐えたのは、最も統率の取れた堅固な異能者だけだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But the heretics did not go down without a fight. Soon, an enraged outcry of psy energy from the brood swept through and above the hives, plunging the brave warriors into horror or bloody insanity. The Astropathic Choir had managed to drown it out with their menacing chants, but this was a test of wills, and only the most disciplined and steadfast psykers withstood its sheer force.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}しかし異端者たちは戦わずに倒れることはなかった。間もなく、個体群からの怒りに満ちた超能力のエネルギーの怒号がハイヴ上空を駆け巡り、勇敢な戦士たちを恐怖や流血の狂気に陥れた。感応通信聖歌隊は、危険な詠唱でその怒号を掻き消そうとしていたが、これは意志の力試しであり、その強大な力に耐えたのは、最も統率の取れた堅固な異能者だけだった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Toutefois, les hérétiques ne se rendent pas sans combattre et bientôt, un hurlement d'énergie psychique provenant du couvain se répand à travers les ruches, plongeant les courageux guerriers dans l'horreur, voire dans une folie sanguinaire. Le chœur astropathique réussit à l'étouffer de ses chants menaçants, mais c'est là une terrible épreuve de volonté et seuls les psykers les plus disciplinés et les plus inébranlables parviennent à résister à sa puissance.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But the heretics did not go down without a fight. Soon, an enraged outcry of psy energy from the brood swept through and above the hives, plunging the brave warriors into horror or bloody insanity. The Astropathic Choir had managed to drown it out with their menacing chants, but this was a test of wills, and only the most disciplined and steadfast psykers withstood its sheer force.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Toutefois, les hérétiques ne se rendent pas sans combattre et bientôt, un hurlement d'énergie psychique provenant du couvain se répand à travers les ruches, plongeant les courageux guerriers dans l'horreur, voire dans une folie sanguinaire. Le chœur astropathique réussit à l'étouffer de ses chants menaçants, mais c'est là une terrible épreuve de volonté et seuls les psykers les plus disciplinés et les plus inébranlables parviennent à résister à sa puissance.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Doch die Ketzer ergaben sich nicht kampflos. Bald fegte ein zorniger Psi-Aufschrei der Rotte über die Makropolen hinweg und stürzte die mutigen Krieger ins Entsetzen oder in den blutigen Wahnsinn. Der astropathische Chor konnte die Psi-Energien mit seinen Drohgesängen übertönen, doch es war ein ungeheurer Willenskampf. Nur die diszipliniertesten und standhaftesten Psioniker konnte dieser geballten Macht trotzen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But the heretics did not go down without a fight. Soon, an enraged outcry of psy energy from the brood swept through and above the hives, plunging the brave warriors into horror or bloody insanity. The Astropathic Choir had managed to drown it out with their menacing chants, but this was a test of wills, and only the most disciplined and steadfast psykers withstood its sheer force.{/n}

Bald fegte ein zorniger Psi-Aufschrei der Rotte über die Makropolen hinweg und stürzte die mutigen Krieger ins Entsetzen oder in den blutigen Wahnsinn. Der astropathische Chor konnte die Psi-Energien mit seinen Drohgesängen übertönen, doch es war ein ungeheurer Willenskampf. Nur die diszipliniertesten und standhaftesten Psioniker konnte dieser geballten Macht trotzen.{/n}
